text: lys ealaa al'aemaa mnkm- 'ayuha alnas- 'ithm, wala ealaa al'aeraj 'ithm, wala ealaa almarid 'ithm, fi 'an ytkhllafu ean aljhad mae almwmnyn; ledm asttaethm. waman yutie allah warasulah yudkhilh janaat tajri min taht ashjarha wqswrha alanhar, waman yaes allah wrswlh, fytkhllaf ean aljhad mae almwmnyn, yueadhibh edhabana mwlmana mwjeana
